message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You're starting strong, I'll try to counter
You're getting aggressive, I'll try to counter your move!
You're getting desperate, I'll try to squeeze the last bits out of you!
You're getting greedy, I'll try to squeeze something out of you!
You're getting closer to the edge, don't expect mercy!
You're getting ruthless, I'll try to make a last stand!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
You're pushing me to the edge, but I'll try to make one last push!
It's almost over, but I'm not done yet!
You're almost out of time, but I'll make one last attempt to get a better deal!
This is my final offer, take it or we both walk away with nothing!
